value.title: 15 Innovative AI Companies Driving Exponential Shifts In Their Respective Sectors
value.excerpt: AI-built, AI-fueled, AI-powered, AI-informed: it is pervasive. In the hands of innovators, the disruption of AI of companies worldwide trends in a positive direction, and has the potential to change the world.

value.title: Chances Of Collisions Involving Urgently Underway Police Cars And AI Self-Driving Cars
value.excerpt: Regrettably there are going to be instances of urgently underway police cars that collide with self-driving cars, though there are means to try and reduce those chances.

value.title: ‘Good to Know’ headlines: Self-driving taxis and Flamin’ Hot Cheetos flavored Mountain Dew
value.excerpt: NBC News' Vicky Nguyen reports on a new app that is set to offer self-driving taxis, logging into virtual meetings using A.I., and Mountain Dew’s new Flamin’ Hot Cheetos inspired drink.

value.title: China releases key transport technology layout through 2035
value.excerpt: China's Ministry of Transport (MOT) and Ministry of Science and Technology have issued an advisory focusing on problem-solving and self-reliance in key transport technology based on innovation through 2035.

value.title: Why did Tesla’s share price dip following its AI Day reveal?
value.excerpt: How will the latest technologies unveiled at Tesla’s AI Day impact the Tesla share price and the autonomous vehicles market? Read our analysis.

value.title: Waymo launches rider testing for self-driving cars in San Francisco
value.excerpt: Some San Francisco residents will have a new way to get around the city. Waymo has launched rider testing of its self-driving cars. Right now, residents can sign up to become a “trusted tester” in the Waymo One app.

value.title: Cruise is buying solar energy from California farmers to power its electric, self-driving fleet
value.excerpt: Cruise, the self-driving car company under General Motors, has launched a new initiative called Farm to Fleet that will allow the company to source solar power from farms in California’s Central Valley.

value.title: Tesla's Full Self Driving system 'not great,' admits Musk
value.excerpt: Tesla CEO Elon Musk has admitted that the Full Self-Driving system is not that great, adding that the company is trying for a single tech platform for both highway and city streets to make

value.title: Tesla now aims for Full Self-Driving Beta public release in ‘~4 weeks’
value.excerpt: Elon Musk is now saying that Tesla is aiming for the wider public release of its Full Self-Driving Beta in about 4 weeks. We are coming up on almost a year since Tesla started testing its Full Self-Driving Beta in its early access program with some customers.

value.title: Joondalup supports push to become centre for artificial intelligence and robotics
value.excerpt: A major Perth council wants to become Australia’s first urban centre for artificial intelligence and robotics.

value.title: Baidu’s AI assistant raises B round at $5.1 billion valuation

value.title: Xiaomi to acquire self-driving startup Deepmotion to enter EV market
value.excerpt: Co-founder and Chief Executive Officer Lei Jun is now spearheading a drive to take Xiaomi beyond smartphones, personally leading a project to make electric vehicles.

value.title: Ark Invest's Cathie Wood has high hopes for Chinese stocks in the long run - and says her fund's analysts were blown away by Tesla's AI day

value.title: Tesla starts hiring roboticists for its ‘Tesla Bot’ humanoid robot project

value.title: Will Tesla share its self-driving system with other manufacturers?
value.excerpt: At a recent conference dedicated to artificial intelligence, Elon Musk indicated that Autopilot, Tesla’s autonomous driving technology, could at some point be distributed to other automakers, although he did not give any names (or dates) for such an eventuality.

value.title: Watch San Franciscans take a ride in Waymo’s self-driving car
value.excerpt: Autonomous-car specialist is expanding its trial ridesharing service to regular folks in San Francisco as part of a new research program.

value.title: Elon Musk Is Panning Tesla Again. Why That’s No Big Deal.
value.excerpt: Companies are racing to build autonomous vehicles, but judging who has the best systems has become nearly impossible for ordinary people.

value.title: Waymo opens self-driving car testing to some San Francisco residents
value.excerpt: Alphabet-owned Waymo is asking San Francisco residents to help test its self-driving cars in the city it hopes will be its second market.

value.title: A Rare Military Tech Unicorn Looks Past Afghanistan War
value.excerpt: Shield AI initially made drones to protect ground troops, but it has raised $210 million to expand to larger aircraft in more complicated situations.

value.title: Elon Musk says Tesla's latest beta self-driving software is ‘not great’
value.excerpt: Musk's critical tweet on Monday came just days after he touted Tesla's prowess with autonomous systems and components for them at an event called Tesla AI Day.

value.title: Is the ‘D1’ AI chip speeding Tesla towards full autonomy?
value.excerpt: Tesla on its AI day, unveiled a custom chip for training artificial intelligence networks in data centers The D1 chip is part of Tesla’s Dojo

value.title: Tesla To Be The Most 'Deeply Integrated Automative Company' In The World With AI Day Plans Fully-Implemented, Says Ark
value.excerpt: If Tesla Inc (NASDAQ: TSLA) manages to fully implement its AI Day agenda, it would become the most deeply integrated “automotive company” in the world, as per Ark Invest.

value.title: Baidu's AI voice assistant Xiaodu closes funding at $5.1 bln valuation
value.excerpt: Aug 24 (Reuters) - Chinese tech giant Baidu Inc (9888.HK) said on Tuesday its artificial intelligence (AI) voice assistant Xiaodu Technology has closed Series B financing at a $5.1 billion valuation.

value.title: Musk says Tesla's self-driving software update 'not great'
value.excerpt: Tesla Inc's Chief Executive Elon Musk said on Monday said that the electric-car maker was working on improving the much-awaited update to its self-driving software "as fast as possible."

value.title: 2 Big Revelations From Tesla's AI Day Event

value.title: A secret weapon for self-driving car startups: Humans
value.excerpt: Self-driving startups like Cruise and Pony.ai have begun testing their driverless cars in some parts of California in the past year, with an additional feature: Human operators.
